question: What are the genders of <Xing>, <Xue>, and <Yu> respectively? A. boy, girl, boy. B. girl, boy, girl.
What is the common hair color of <Xing> and <Yu>? A. Black. B. Brown.
Do <Xue> and <Yu> have long hair? A. Yes. B. No.
Which roles often wear casual clothing? A. <Xing> and <Yu>. B. <Xue> and <Yu>.
Are <Xing> and <Xue> both humans? A. Yes. B. No.
